          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Bastille ostroma</string>
            <string language="en">The Siege of the Bastille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Belagerung der Bastille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le siège de la bastille</string>

          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A párizsi nép megostormolja a Bastille börtönt 1789. július 14-én</string>
            <string language="en">The Parisian siege the Bastille Jail in 14th July 1789.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
